metadata.title: CVE-2020-15866 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: mruby through 2.1.2-rc has a heap-based buffer overflow in the mrb_yield_with_class function in vm.c because of incorrect VM stack handling. It can be triggered via the stack_copy function.

criterions.comment: mruby package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
